main: ^Haibo, there's my potjie pot. I lost that how long ago? Where did you get that boytjie?
^Um...on the beach just right out there
^My useless son must have left it out there to dry and never brought it back
^Do you want it back? I was hoping I could stay in it for a while. Nothing else seems to fit.

^My name is Herbert. I was looking for an adventure and the ocean washed me up on these shores all the way from the Maldives. It was quite a rough journey and I seemed to have lost my only shell along the way
^Yoh, the ocean can be quite the wonders guide. You may have ended up right where you need to be if it’s an adventure that you're looking for.
^Aggg please! Call me Ouma! How about you stay with me for a while, boytjie? You can help me gather some special ingredients from the coast to help me cook my potjie.
^... I mean... theres not much else I can do, so why not...
^Great choice boytjie! Lets get you started right away! And you can keep my potjie pot for your shell. Had I know where it was, I wouldnt have gotten a new one!
